Level1.name: BRING THE LIGHT
Level1.description: Repair a total of 2 generator(s).

Level1.name: GRUESOME
Level1.description: Hook 8 Survivor(s).

Level1.name: SAVIOR
Level1.description: Unhook 2 Survivor(s). Must unhook them safely.

Level1.name: SCRAP YARD
Level1.description: Damage 6 generator(s).

Level1.name: MECHANICAL OBSESSION
Level1.description: Damage the same generator 2 times.

Level1.name: BRUTAL BREAKER
Level1.description: Damage a generator or destroy a dropped pallet 5 time(s) while using the perk Brutal Strength.

Level1.name: HUNGRY JAWS
Level1.description: Catch a Survivor in a Bear Trap 2 time(s) as The Trapper.

Level1.name: PATCHED UP
Level1.description: Completely heal 4 health state(s) of any Survivor.

Level1.name: BLOODY REWARDS
Level1.description: Earn 50 000 Bloodpoints.

Level1.name: THE LAST PLACE YOU LOOK
Level1.description: Unlock 5 chest(s).

Level1.name: PLUNDER KING
Level1.description: Unlock 3 chest(s) while using the perk Plunderer's Instinct.

Level1.name: LIBERATOR
Level1.description: Unhook 5 Survivor(s). Must unhook them safely.

Level1.name: DARK TRIUMPH
Level1.description: Sacrifice 1 Survivor(s) during the Endgame Collapse.

Level1.name: SKILLED OPERATOR
Level1.description: Succeed at 20 Skill Check(s).

Level1.name: THIS IS HAPPENING
Level1.description: Get a Great result on 3 Skill Check(s) while using the perk This Is Not Happening.

Level1.name: CLAUDETTE'S DETERMINATION
Level1.description: As Claudette Morel, escape a trial.

Level1.name: AMATEUR ORNITHOLOGIST
Level1.description: Disturb 25 crows.

Level1.name: CRAFT TIME'S OVER
Level1.description: Cleanse 8 Totem(s).

Level1.name: REVERENT
Level1.description: Sacrifice 5 Survivor(s) to The Entity.

Level1.name: NONE SHALL SURVIVE
Level1.description: Kill all Survivors in a trial 1 time(s) by any means.

Level1.name: EMPATHIC
Level1.description: Completely heal 2 health state(s) of any Survivor while using the perk Empathy.

Level2.name: AGITATED ADVANTAGE
Level2.description: Hook 2 Survivor(s) in the basement while using the perk Agitation.

Level2.name: GOLDEN AGE
Level2.description: Earn 20 emblem(s) of Gold quality or better.

Level2.name: SELF CARE SERVICE
Level2.description: Completely heal yourself for 2 health state(s) while using the perk Self-Care.

Level2.name: MANIFEST DISTRESS
Level2.description: Chase Survivors for a total of 90 second(s) while using the perk Distressing.

Level2.name: BY ANY MEANS NECESSARY
Level2.description: Drop 15 pallet(s) while being chased by the Killer.

Level2.name: FIGHT BACK
Level2.description: Drop a pallet to stun the Killer 2 time(s).

Level2.name: HUNGRY JAWS
Level2.description: Catch a Survivor in a Bear Trap 4 time(s) as The Trapper.

Level2.name: GENEROSITY
Level2.description: Heal a total of 10 health state(s) of other Survivors.

Level2.name: DARK SENSES
Level2.description: Finish repairing 3 generator(s) while using the perk Dark Sense.

Level2.name: LIBERATOR
Level2.description: Unhook 10 Survivor(s). Must unhook them safely.

Level2.name: BOTANIST EXTRAORDINAIRE
Level2.description: Finish healing 2 health state(s) of other Survivors while using the perk Botany Knowledge and a Med-kit.

Level2.name: PAID IN FULL
Level2.description: Unhook a Survivor who unhooked you earlier in the trial 1 time(s). Must unhook them safely.

Level3.name: PROPERTY DAMAGE
Level3.description: Damage a generator or destroy a dropped pallet 30 time(s).

Level3.name: BURIED UNDERGROUND
Level3.description: Hook 5 Survivor(s) in the basement.

Level3.name: YOU, YES, YOU
Level3.description: Hook the Obsession 2 time(s).

Level3.name: NO ONE ESCAPES THE ENDGAME
Level3.description: Sacrifice 2 Survivor(s) during the Endgame Collapse while using the perk Hex: No One Escapes Death.

Level3.name: LIBERATOR
Level3.description: Unhook 15 Survivor(s). Must unhook them safely.

Level3.name: HUNGRY JAWS
Level3.description: Catch a Survivor in a Bear trap 5 time(s) as The Trapper.

Level3.name: MONSTROUS MAYHEM
Level3.description: Hook a Survivor in the basement while another Survivor is on a basement hook 1 time(s) while using the per Scourge Hook: Monstrous Shrine.

Level3.name: GOT YOU
Level3.description: Interrupt and grab 2 Survivor(s).

Level3.name: LAST MINUTE HERO
Level3.description: Unhook 1 Survivor(s) after the Endgame Collapse has begun. Must unhook them safely.

Level3.name: HOPE IS ALL WE HAVE
Level3.description: Escape 1 trial(s) through the exit gate while using the perk Hope.

Level3.name: IRIDESCENT AGE
Level3.description: Earn 15 emblem(s) of Iridescent quality.

Level3.name: OBSESSIVE
Level3.description: Kill the Obsession 4 time(s) by any means.

Level3.name: UNNERVING ENCOUNTER
Level3.description: Prevent any exit gates from being opened while using the perk Unnerving Presence. Do this 1 time(s).

Level3.name: BLINDSIDED
Level3.description: Blind the Killer 4 time(s).

Level3.name: LIFE GIVER
Level3.description: Heal a total of 5 health state(s) of any Survivor.

Level3.name: ALL BETTER!
Level3.description: Completely heal 3 health state(s) of any Survivor.

Level3.name: DECISIVE LIGHT
Level3.description: Blind the Killer while they are carrying a Survivor 1 time(s).

Level3.name: LOCKED & FOUND
Level3.description: Fully deplete 3 key(s).

Level3.name: ESCAPE ARTIST
Level3.description: Escape 5 trial(s).

Level3.name: CHILLING ESCAPE
Level3.description: Escape a trial without being hooked by the killer while using the perk Spine Chill.
